name: Master-david-s-high-level-map-filter
tagline: This is a high level mapping fillter
body:
# Master David's High Level Map Filer


Show
    ItemLevel >= 77
    Rarity = Normal
    BaseType "Platinum Kris" "Golden Kris" "Copper Kris" "Ambusher" "Imperial Skean"
    SetTextColor 255 255 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 255 255
    SetFontSize 50

Show
    ItemLevel >= 77
    Rarity = Magic
    BaseType "Platinum Kris" "Golden Kris" "Copper Kris" "Ambusher" "Imperial Skean"
    SetTextColor 0 0 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 0 0 255
    SetFontSize 50

Show
    ItemLevel >= 77
    Rarity = Rare
    BaseType "Platinum Kris" "Golden Kris" "Copper Kris" "Ambusher" "Imperial Skean"
    SetTextColor 255 215 0
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 215 0
    SetFontSize 50

Show
    ItemLevel >= 84
    Rarity = Rare
    BaseType "Titanium Spirit Shield" "Harmonic Spirit Shield" "Fossilised Spirit Shield" "Archon Kite Shield" "Imperial Buckler" "Vaal Spirit Shield" "Supreme Spiked Shield"
    SetTextColor 255 255 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 255 255
    SetFontSize 50

Show
    ItemLevel >= 75
    Rarity = Rare
    BaseType "Titanium Spirit Shield" "Harmonic Spirit Shield" "Fossilised Spirit Shield" "Archon Kite Shield" "Imperial Buckler" "Vaal Spirit Shield" "Supreme Spiked Shield"
    SetTextColor 255 220 50
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 220 50
    SetFontSize 50

Show
    ItemLevel >= 75
    Rarity = Rare
    BaseType "Vaal Regalia" "Astral Plate" "Saintly Chainmail" "Carnal Armour" "Glorious Plate" "Triumphant Lamellar" "Assassin's Garb" "Zodiac Leather" "Sadist Garb" "Blood Raiment"
    SetTextColor 255 220 50
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 220 50
    SetFontSize 50

Show
    ItemLevel >= 84
    Rarity = Normal
    BaseType "Vaal Regalia" "Astral Plate" "Saintly Chainmail" "Carnal Armour" "Glorious Plate" "Triumphant Lamellar" "Assassin's Garb" "Zodiac Leather" "Sadist Garb" "Blood Raiment"
    SetTextColor 255 255 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 255 255
    SetFontSize 50
    PlayAlertSound 3 150

Show
    ItemLevel >= 84
    Rarity = Normal
    BaseType "Titan Gauntlets" "Slink Gloves" "Dragonscale Gauntlets" "Crusader Gloves" "Murder Mitts" "Titan Greaves" "Slink Boots" "Sorcerer Gloves" "Sorcerer Boots" "Dragonscale Boots" "Crusader Boots" "Murder Boots"
    SetTextColor 255 255 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 255 255
    SetFontSize 50

Show
    ItemLevel >= 75
    Rarity = Rare
    BaseType "Titan Gauntlets" "Slink Gloves" "Dragonscale Gauntlets" "Crusader Gloves" "Murder Mitts" "Titan Greaves" "Slink Boots" "Sorcerer Gloves" "Sorcerer Boots" "Dragonscale Boots" "Crusader Boots" "Murder Boots"
    SetTextColor 255 220 50
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 220 50
    SetFontSize 50
    
Show
    ItemLevel >= 78
    Rarity = Normal
    BaseType "Eternal Burgonet" "Lion Pelt" "Nightmare Bascinet" "Praetor Crown" "Deicide Mask" "Vaal Mask" "Hubris Circlet"
    SetTextColor 255 255 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 255 255
    SetFontSize 50
    PlayAlertSound 2 100

Show
    ItemLevel >= 78
    Rarity = Magic
    BaseType "Eternal Burgonet" "Lion Pelt" "Nightmare Bascinet" "Praetor Crown" "Deicide Mask" "Vaal Mask" "Hubris Circlet"
    SetTextColor 0 0 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 0 0 255
    SetFontSize 50
    PlayAlertSound 2 100

Show
    ItemLevel >= 75
    Rarity = Rare
    BaseType "Eternal Burgonet" "Lion Pelt" "Nightmare Bascinet" "Praetor Crown" "Deicide Mask" "Vaal Mask" "Hubris Circlet"
    SetTextColor 255 215 0
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 220 50
    SetFontSize 50
    PlayAlertSound 2 150

Show
    ItemLevel >= 75
    Rarity = Rare
    BaseType "Jewelled Foil" "Runic Hatchet" "Opal Sceptre" "Behemoth Mace" "Nightmare Mace" "Sambar Sceptre" "Gemini Claw" "Imperial Claw" "Profane Wand" "Vaal Rapier" "Imbued Wand" "Profane Wand"
    SetTextColor 255 220 50
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 220 50
    SetFontSize 50

Show
    ItemLevel > 82
    Rarity = Normal
    BaseType "Jewelled Foil" "Runic Hatchet" "Opal Sceptre" "Behemoth Mace" "Nightmare Mace" "Sambar Sceptre" "Gemini Claw" "Imperial Claw" "Profane Wand" "Vaal Rapier" "Imbued Wand" "Profane Wand"
    SetTextColor 255 255 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 255 255
    SetFontSize 50

Show
    ItemLevel >= 75
    Rarity = Rare
    BaseType "Fleshripper" "Vaal Axe" "Void Axe" "Karui Chopper" "Thicket Bow" "Harbinger Bow" "Imperial Bow" "Terror Maul" "Coronal Maul" "Meatgrinder" "Eclipse Staff"
    SetTextColor 255 220 50
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 220 50
    SetFontSize 50

Show
    ItemLevel >= 83
    Rarity = Normal
    BaseType "Fleshripper" "Vaal Axe" "Void Axe" "Karui Chopper" "Thicket Bow" "Harbinger Bow" "Imperial Bow" "Terror Maul" "Coronal Maul" "Meatgrinder" "Eclipse Staff" "Piledriver"
    SetTextColor 255 255 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 0 0 0
    SetFontSize 50

Show
    ItemLevel >= 75
    Rarity = Normal
    BaseType "Diamond Ring"
    SetTextColor 255 255 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 0 0 0
    SetFontSize 45
    PlayAlertSound 6 150

Show
    ItemLevel >= 75
    Rarity = Rare
    BaseType "Diamond Ring"
    SetTextColor 255 255 119
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 215 0
    SetFontSize 45
    PlayAlertSound 6 150

Show
    Class "Quest Items"

Show
    Class "Card"
    SetTextColor 30 144 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 192 203
    SetFontSize 45
    PlayAlertSound 1 100

# Field 1, BLOW THE FUCK UP
Show
    Class "Fishing Rod"
    SetTextColor 255 0 255
    SetFontSize 45
    PlayAlertSound 1 79

Show
    BaseType "Mirror of Kalandra" "Rhoa Feather"
    SetTextColor 255 0 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 0 255
    SetFontSize 44
    PlayAlertSound 5 300

# Field 2, Currency
Show
    BaseType "Divine Orb" "Exalted Orb"
    SetTextColor 74 230 58
    SetBorderColor 0 255 0
    SetFontSize 50
    PlayAlertSound 5 300

Show
    BaseType "Regal Orb" "Orb of Regret" "Vaal Orb" "Chaos Orb" "Blessed Orb" "Gemcutter's Prism" "Orb of Fusing" "Orb of Scouring" "Orb of Alchemy" "Cartographer's Chisel"
    SetTextColor 74 230 58
    SetBorderColor 0 255 0
    SetFontSize 45
    PlayAlertSound 3 300

Show
    BaseType "Perandus Coin"
    SetTextColor 210 0 0
    SetBorderColor 0 255 0
    SetFontSize 45

# Show or hide remaining worthwhile currency.
Show
    BaseType "Orb of Alteration" "Orb of Chance" "Glassblower's Bauble" "Chromatic Orb" "Jeweller's Orb"
    SetTextColor 255 0 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 0 255
    SetFontSize 44

Show
    BaseType "Silver Key" "Golden Key" "Treasure Key"
    SetTextColor 50 230 100
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 210 0 0
    SetFontSize 44
    PlayAlertSound 1 200

Show
    Class "Currency"

# If someone knows how to filter corrupted 6 links message me
Show
    LinkedSockets = 6
    SetTextColor 210 0 0
    SetBackgroundColor 255 255 255 0
    SetBorderColor 255 255 119
    SetFontSize 45
    PlayAlertSound 1 100

Show
    LinkedSockets = 5
    SetTextColor 208 32 144
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 255 255
    SetFontSize 44
    PlayAlertSound 1 100

Show
    Sockets = 6
    SetTextColor 255 255 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 255 255
    SetFontSize 44
    PlayAlertSound 1 100

Show
    SocketGroup "RGB"
    SetBorderColor 170 170 170

# Field 3, Gems
Show
    Class "Gem"
    BaseType "Vaal"
    SetBorderColor 220 30 30
    PlayAlertSound 1 100

Show
    Quality > 0
    Class "Gem"
    SetBorderColor 30 150 180
    PlayAlertSound 1 100

Hide
    Class "Gems"

Show
    DropLevel >= 75
    Class "Maps"
    SetTextColor 255 255 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 255 0
    SetFontSize 45
    PlayAlertSound 4 225

# Maps
Show
    Rarity = Normal
    Class "Map"
    SetTextColor 255 255 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 220 50
    SetFontSize 44

Show
    Rarity = Magic
    Class "Map"
    SetTextColor 0 0 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 220 50
    SetFontSize 44
    
Show
    Rarity = Rare
    Class "Map"
    SetTextColor 255 215 0
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 215 0
    SetFontSize 44

# Uniques
Show
    Rarity = Unique
    SetTextColor 150 0 0
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 150 0 0
    SetFontSize 45
    PlayAlertSound 6 220

Show
    Rarity = Unique
    Class "Jewel"
    SetTextColor 210 0 0
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 210 0 0
    SetFontSize 44
    PlayAlertSound 1 100

Show
    Rarity = Magic
    Class "Jewel"
    SetTextColor 30 144 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 255 255
    SetFontSize 45

Show
    Rarity = Rare
    Class "Jewel"
    SetTextColor 255 200 0
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 255 255
    SetFontSize 45
    PlayAlertSound 2 250

Show
    ItemLevel >= 60
    Rarity = Rare
    Class "Rings" "Amulets" "Belts"
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 220 50
    SetFontSize 45

# Display all regular jewelry as well
Show
    Rarity = Rare
    Class "Rings" "Amulets" "Belts"
    SetTextColor 255 220 50
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 220 50
    SetFontSize 50
    
# Color border based on ilvl for recipe
Show
    ItemLevel < 60
    Rarity = Rare
    SetBorderColor 255 220 50

Show
    ItemLevel < 75
    Rarity = Rare

# 75+ items can be highlighted differently for regal recipe awareness
Show
    ItemLevel >= 75
    Rarity = Rare
    SetTextColor 255 220 50

# flask
Show
    Quality >= 0
    Class "Life Flasks" "Mana Flasks" "Utility Flasks"
    SetTextColor 255 255 255
    SetBackgroundColor 0 0 0
    SetBorderColor 255 255 255
    SetFontSize 35

# Jewelry
Show
    ItemLevel >= 75
    Rarity < Magic
    Class "Rings" "Amulets" "Belts"
    SetBorderColor 255 255 255
    SetFontSize 50

Show
    ItemLevel >= 60
    Rarity >= Rare
    Class "Rings" "Amulets" "Belts"
    SetTextColor 255 215 0
    SetBorderColor 255 215 0
    SetFontSize 50
    PlayAlertSound 7 71

# Chance Bases
Show
    Rarity = Normal
    BaseType "Sorcerer Boots"
    SetBorderColor 255 220 50
    SetFontSize 43
    PlayAlertSound 4 150

# Uncomment this hide block for a much more strict filter.
Hide
    Rarity < Rare
    SetBackgroundColor 128 128 128 128
    SetFontSize 16

# Fully Linked One Handers
Hide
    LinkedSockets = 3
    Class "One Hand" "Claws" "Daggers" "Wands" "Sceptres" "Shields"

Show
    LinkedSockets >= 4

# Corrupted Items with white sockets
Show
    Sockets >= 3
    SocketGroup "W"

# Quality Items
Hide
    Quality = 20

# Can be more specific in these areas but currently only the few highest tiers of items will drop
Hide
    DropLevel >= 56
    Class "One Hand" "Two Hand" "Claws" "Daggers" "Wands" "Sceptres" "Bows" "Staves"

Hide
    DropLevel >= 62
    Rarity < Rare
    Class "Helmets"

Hide
    DropLevel >= 66
    Rarity < Rare
    Class "Gloves"

Hide
    DropLevel >= 64
    Rarity < Rare
    Class "Boots"

Hide
    DropLevel >= 62
    Rarity < Rare
    Class "Body Armours"

Hide
    DropLevel >= 59
    Rarity < Rare
    Class "Shields"

# Show all items until middle of cruel as every base is potentially useful at some point
Hide
    Sockets >= 4

Hide
    ItemLevel < 40
    Sockets >= 3

Hide
    ItemLevel < 60
    Rarity < Rare
    Class "Rings" "Amulets" "Belts"
    SetBorderColor 255 255 255

# If you�re leveling, every item is useful
Hide
    ItemLevel < 40

# Field 8, Exceptions
Hide
    BaseType "Kris" "Quartz Sceptre" "Crystal Sceptre" "Opal Sceptre"

# Because who doesn�t like to see insanely high ilvl simple robes and iron hats?
Show
    ItemLevel > 77
    DropLevel <= 6

Show
    SetBackgroundColor 128 128 128 128
    SetFontSize 16
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
